title: From idea to website in 3 simple steps
subtitle: Get your professional website online in minutes, not weeks

steps.title: Describe your business
steps.description: Tell us about your business in a few words. Our AI understands your industry and target audience.
steps.details: Just answer a few simple questions about what you do, who you serve, and what makes you unique. No technical knowledge required.

steps.title: AI creates your site
steps.description: Our AI generates a professional website tailored to your business with content, design, and structure.
steps.details: In minutes, you'll have a complete website with professional copy, beautiful design, and all the pages your business needs.

steps.title: You go live
steps.description: Review, customize, and publish your website. Connect your domain and start attracting customers.
steps.details: Make any final tweaks, connect your domain, and launch. Your website is ready to start bringing in customers.

features.title: Everything included
features.subtitle: No hidden costs or surprise fees
